items.text:
**CASTING CALL - No Budget Independent Film ESCAPE ROOM**

**Production Title:** Escape Room
**Director/Writer:** Hank Orion
**Production Type:** Independent Feature, No Budget
**Shooting Dates:** May 16 and 17 (2 shooting days)
**Location:** London, UK
**Compensation:** Unpaid, travel covered, IMDb credit, meals, copy for reel
**Genre:** Thriller

**Synopsis**

Emily, a withdrawn young woman looking for a fresh start, is drawn in by the charismatic Kate, whose friendship turns intoxicating before becoming dangerous. Once Kate lures her into a secretive underground club, Emily is drugged, kidnapped, and prepared to be sold. Fighting through fear and disorientation, she battles to escape and uncovers the horrifying truth that Kate has done this before. Emily transforms from victim to survivor, determined to stop the cycle from continuing.

**ROLES**

**EMILY (Female, late 20s)**
Quiet, artistic, and struggling with loneliness, Emily gradually reveals hidden resilience as her world falls apart. Requires strong emotional range, scenes of panic and fear, physical struggle, and moments with minimal dialogue.

**KATE (Female, early 30s)**
Charismatic and free spirited on the surface, secretly manipulative and predatory. The actor must play both warm and sinister tones, with intense dialogue scenes and subtle psychological control.

**THE MAN, CAPTOR (Male, 40s to 50s)**
Cold, professional, and detached. Minimal English. Requires a strong physical presence, minimal dialogue, and calm menace. Scenes involve restraints, injections, and confrontation.

**YOUNGER CAPTOR (Male, 20s to early 30s)**
Nervous, inexperienced, conflicted participant in the trafficking network. Minimal dialogue, physical scenes, and a tense fight moment with Emily.

**LEAD MAN IN THE CLUB LOUNGE (Male, 30s to 40s)**
Charming yet predatory. Warm smile hiding danger. Requires charisma with an unsettling edge, invasive dialogue, and subtle intimidation.

**LEAD WOMAN IN THE CLUB LOUNGE (Female, 20s to 40s)**
Stylish and alluring, with a predatory undertone. Requires ability to play seductive but threatening, including close proximity interactions and emotional nuance.

Apply via: [https://auditionninja.com/audition/escape-room/](https://auditionninja.com/audition/escape-room/)

Thank you so much.

items.text:
When putting up a casting call in the group, in regards to the contact information, particularly email address, please make sure it's an email address that actually exists and works and that you're actually able to recieve emails. If not,  then the casting call is just wasting everyone's time who wishes to apply for it. Myself being an actor, I've ran into two casting calls recently that seemed legitimate where the email address given on it didn't work and it bounced back saying it doesn't exist or it cannot receive emails anymore. Please make sure that isn't the case with your email address when wanting people to apply for your casting call. Respectfully, Actors don't have time to waste as much as you do as a Casting or Production Team. üôèüôèüôè.

Thank You üòÅ üòä üôè

***FREE SOLO SHOW CLASS THIS SATURDAY ***

Hello Theatre Community!

Are you curious about creating a ONE PERSON SHOW?

Then you do not want to miss this 100% FREE, 100% AWESOME solo theatre class "The Art of Creating the One Person Show" commencing THIS SAT NOV 22ND @10AM (PST)/12pm (CST)/1pm (EST) via Zoom.

RSVP HERE: [[https://www.soaringsolostudios.com/free-one-person-play.../](https://www.soaringsolostudios.com/free-one-person-play-class/?fbclid=IwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExVzdXRmdWRUUxMUlLWnBSRHNydGMGYXBwX2lkEDIyMjAzOTE3ODgyMDA4OTIAAR5JOXkrGupSob_aL7XRY7Ik_98-uI11G6oVvxBIC0u-1wdb93899gE0kpTsMQ_aem_NYPp-jb3GhTzidIXnux5pA)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.soaringsolostudios.com%2Ffree-one-person-play-class%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExVzdXRmdWRUUxMUlLWnBSRHNydGMGYXBwX2lkEDIyMjAzOTE3ODgyMDA4OTIAAR547mRa3QDqLMFyYTJcGULWCwYNj3MxApUIVLCrl1VpBdhdUfbBoWDYcYLZ8A_aem_DlUN5OUEjtov1q36Cbrbcg&h=AT25Uu8u1Bh833c7rTLN1AuU_1B9ULYYG3Zeyz09wBgWTOWGJWiwn7EWSt5Tvvety3mBpg3QjiTic8DbnjYqPRyUta74dQu_PYjC_NDXS8bc3nQjiD8JQOewzzVexAokXFn_abXGrEmWAjEXL7vgFao&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT2pa-OxMQCeSFwubtmUEZs9QURpCCAc3ME-UwV-zkbSpP63P1ZwKZzy-aq1rgggyCMQy7AcUi5boJGVY0pXy4D1iQ5N3fLH2Js9MU4wvaoJSi3hJYDmz60Atn-gYW1vqgmz696MDvQogRwdwNzVrUNOVSFteuRe_Zh8fe16zw)

I have been teaching this ongoing FREE class for over a decade and I have been working in the genre of Solo Theatre for over 20 years. I have directed & developed well over 175 solo shows and toured successfully with my own award-winning solo shows, and I would be honored and excited to help guide YOU into your own success as a Solo Artist.

**ALL EXPERIENCE LEVELS WELCOME**, and no material needed to bring to the virtual class as I always provide a writing prompt. If you do have a solo excerpt you wish to share, that option will be available too.

All you need to attend this Zoom class is a willingness to explore, something to write with and on, and an RSVP here: [[https://www.soaringsolostudios.com/free-one-person-play.../](https://www.soaringsolostudios.com/free-one-person-play-class/?fbclid=IwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExVzdXRmdWRUUxMUlLWnBSRHNydGMGYXBwX2lkEDIyMjAzOTE3ODgyMDA4OTIAAR6MpS3AJnmqUOCIMAKTzI2vfZkFDp1yZGGDeU1JCLSmdZKB_zb_NdSfF8_3mQ_aem_CWtiIZXQ6PVSuzhTP1VR_A)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.soaringsolostudios.com%2Ffree-one-person-play-class%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExVzdXRmdWRUUxMUlLWnBSRHNydGMGYXBwX2lkEDIyMjAzOTE3ODgyMDA4OTIAAR52cSZXKPPIAuvqVIWO2Etv1tt2108KcEf7erKwl8WgDwuO7gnj8fOnJKTmRg_aem_ZG_LDTB5G5vHvPxm-FKWEA&h=AT25Uu8u1Bh833c7rTLN1AuU_1B9ULYYG3Zeyz09wBgWTOWGJWiwn7EWSt5Tvvety3mBpg3QjiTic8DbnjYqPRyUta74dQu_PYjC_NDXS8bc3nQjiD8JQOewzzVexAokXFn_abXGrEmWAjEXL7vgFao&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT2pa-OxMQCeSFwubtmUEZs9QURpCCAc3ME-UwV-zkbSpP63P1ZwKZzy-aq1rgggyCMQy7AcUi5boJGVY0pXy4D1iQ5N3fLH2Js9MU4wvaoJSi3hJYDmz60Atn-gYW1vqgmz696MDvQogRwdwNzVrUNOVSFteuRe_Zh8fe16zw)

I truly hope you will join the Soaring Solo Community and I for this fabulous virtual event. Let's turn your solo show dreams into an amazing reality!

Jessica

Founder & CEO of Soaring Solo Studios

Blogger for NoHo Arts

Director/Teaching Artist for the LA Women's Theatre Festival

Director & Developer of over 175 solo shows

items.text:
Casting Call üéâüéâüéâ

‚ÄòThe Lines We Crossed‚Äô short film üé¨

A raw and tender story of found family, the messiness of healing, and the unexpected power of being seen. Three lives, stitched together by loneliness, come alive in the light of connection - and in that light, hope can take root where none was meant to grow.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Secondary role: Mrs Habib, Deva's mother, was once warm and loving, but grief has reshaped her. She struggles to see her son as she once did and can no longer be the nurturing presence he longs for. Her heart turned stone cold, after the death of her only daughter, she now suppresses her maternal instincts.

Female
30-55 years
Middle Eastern heritage

Shooting date: 08/12/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Secondary role: Mrs. Kane is dramatic, flirty, and unapologetically over-the-top, with a flair for gossip and a love of all things a little chavvy. While she loves both of her children, her eldest, Cody, is clearly the favorite - her pride and joy - often leaving Keira to fend for herself. Mrs. Kane desperately clings to Cody's success, seeing it as her ticket to status and financial security.

Female
30-55 years
White/Caucasian
London Accent

Shooting date: 06/12/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Extra: Marty is the friendly local shopkeeper who's known the Kane family for years. He's the kind of man who hears all the town gossip but never lets a word slip. With his quick wit and easy smile, this cheeky chappy brings warmth and quiet support to everyone who crosses his path.

Male
50-70 years
White/Caucasian

Shooting date: 29/11/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Deadline: 26/11/2025 at 12pm GMT

To audition please contact @lines_we_crossed_film on instagram or Madeleine Bloore here on Facebook.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Actors ignore it because it feels ‚Äútoo simple.‚Äù

But simple is beautiful. The simple message: I love you.

This is the most castable archetype in Hollywood, and you need to know how to play it.

 You are one audition away from a life-changing booking.
 But it starts here.

If today lit something up in you, don‚Äôt let it fade.

We are selective about who we coach so we ask you to fill out a written Screen Test.

When you fill out this form don't hold back. 

https://form.jotform.com/253125203574248 

We want to know you. 

We won't laugh at your dream. It's real to us and it matters. 

We want to coach actors who are passionate and dedicated. 

Tell us your story.

items.text:
**Raum Rheinland | Freundinnen-Paar zum Thema Geschenke f√ºr TV-Beitrag gesucht**

** **

F√ºr einen TV-Beitrag des Magazins ‚ÄûLife‚Äú suchen wir zwei Freundinnen, die im Rheinland zuhause sind. Gemeinsam mit euch wollen wir testen, welche Methode das beste Geschenk f√ºr die Person an eurer Seite hervorbringt: eure eigene Idee, die Empfehlung einer Expertin oder der Vorschlag einer KI.

 

Im Experiment √ºberlegt ihr euch zun√§chst jeweils ein Geschenk f√ºreinander. Danach besprecht ihr eure Ideen mit einer Expertin, die ebenfalls ein Geschenk f√ºr die andere Person entwickelt. Zum Abschluss tritt eine KI an ‚Äì und wir schauen, welches Geschenk am Ende am meisten √ºberzeugt.

 

Ihr habt Lust mitzumachen und herauszufinden, womit ihr der anderen Person die gr√∂√üte Freude machen k√∂nnt? Dann schreibt mir einfach eine Nachricht :)

Freue mich auf eure Nachrichten!

attachments.ocrText: Keine Fotobeschreibung verf√ºgbar.

Film Period from the 24th -28th November and 8th and 9th December in Cheltenham, Gloucestershire. 

Length: 10 minutes 

Genre: Surreal psychological drama Exploring Identity and grief. This is a great onset experience. Expand your portfolio and will be going to film festivals across the country 

Please send a headshot and a short bio and where you are based to S4306512@glos.ac.uk

The character descriptions are below for the twins.

As the story progresses, his longing individuality and pushing him against the constraints moves from and hope heartbreak, confusion, and tragic collapse tries Kay controlled, emotionally stabilising force brothers' shared life. clings fiercely structure and sameness, believing routine thing keeping their world intact. Beneath his calm exterior lies fear: losing control, most losing Abe. As Abe drifts away, Kay's frustration into anger, then into guilt, and desperate attempt shifts emotional reluctant script interested:'

items.text:
Casting Call!

We have one role left to cast!!

*Starchild* is a sci-fi drama that follows the story of two scientists, Vanessa and Tanner as they take separate paths to deal with their grief. Vanessa through faith, and Tanner through science. It's not until they discover the origins of life itself, that they reconcile to start a family of their own.

Looking to cast supporting character John Marlow.

The film is heartfelt, honest, and powerful.

Please send resume, headshot, and (if applicable) demo reel to starchildcasting@gmail.com

attachments.ocrText: May be a graphic of text that says 'STARCHILD Casting Call! 1CHARACTERSSTILLAVAILIBLE! 1CHARACTER STILL AVAILIBLE!! LOOKING FOR: MALE SUPPORTING CHARACTER MALE-SUPPORTINGCHARACTER- 30'S 30'S-60'S 60'S EMAIL BELOW FOR SUBMISSION DETAILS STARCHILDCASTING@GMAIL.COM'
May be an image of text

May be an image of text that says 'John Marlowe Male Late 30s to 60s Any ethnicity Pastor John carries quiet authority and compassion, arriving with coffee, donuts, and genuine care. He sees through Tanner's defenses in single conversation and challenges him to grieve with honesty his faith grounded in realism. Though a one- scene role, his presence anchors the story's moral compass, bridging belief and understanding. Must bring warmth, presence, and strong listening skills.'

the wait is over! we are now accepting submissions for our summer production of ‚ÄúBe More Chill!‚Äù

for full details, visit the link in our bio.

Simone Nathalia - Director/Choreographer
Taylor McKee - Music Director
Madison Raybould - Choreographer
Morgan Da Silva-Rolph - Stage Manager

audition dates
in-person: December 20th & 21st, 2025
callbacks: January 3rd, 2026
self-tapes: submissions due on Dec. 19th

audition venue:
Carousel Theatre for Young People, 1411 Cartwright St, Granville Island

audition requirements:
all roles in this production are volunteer, non-union. xoxo welcomes performers 18+ of all genders, ethnicities, and skill levels to audition.

what to prepare:
1. 2 contrasting musical theatre songs, (you may only be asked to sing one, but please have both ready).

2. a 1-2 minute contemporary, comedic monologue - this must be memorized.

how to apply:
please email your headshot and resume to theatre@xoxotv.ca to be scheduled with an audition time, or to request a self-tape submission.

character breakdowns can be found in our ‚Äúaudition package‚Äù link in bio.

production dates:
July 15th - 18th, 2026

production venue:
Firehall Arts Centre, 280 E Cordova St, Vancouver

notes:
rehearsals will begin April 30th, 2026
Saturdays 10:00am to 6:00pm
Tuesdays & Thursdays 6:00pm to 10:00pm

contact info@xoxotv.ca or DM us with any questions!

best of luck to all performers - we‚Äôll see you at auditions! üòÅüíÑüêæ

Music and Lyrics by Joe Iconis
Book by Joe Tracz
Based on the Novel by Ned Vizzini

BE MORE CHILL is presented by arrangement with Concord Theatricals.
www.concordtheatricals.com
The world premiere production of Be More Chill was commissioned and originally produced by Two River Theater Company in Red Bank, NJ
John Dias, Artistic Director / Michael Hurst, Managing Director
This work was supported by a Theatre Commissioning and Production Initiative grant from the Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
Orchestrations and Arrangements by Charlie Rosen
.
.

**Jigsaw Casting is seeking a Weather Reporter for a Quick Serve Restaurant Campaign across Canada**

We are also open to a host or news reporter. They‚Äôre likeable, relatable, charming, and capable of giving an authentic performance. The ideal candidate has real-life reporting experience. The age range is 40s. Someone that knows the weather like the back of their hand, the subtlety and nuances. They‚Äôre confident and engaging, with a comedic sensibility.

This will be filming in Toronto. If someone lives far from this area, travel and accommodation will be provided.

**IF YOU KNOW OF SOMEONE, PLEASE PASS THIS ON!**

This is a non union job. Compensation if selected: $3,075.00. Buyout is based on survival of the edit and includes all lifts, edits, versions.

Must be available for these Important dates:

Recall: Wed Nov 26th, 2025 in Toronto Studio or via zoom if you live far away from Toronto.

Wardrobe: Dec 5th, 2025.

Shoot Date: Dec 9th with a weather hold of Dec 10th, 2025.

*Talent will be shooting outside, in Toronto.

**DEADLINE TO SUBMIT: ASAP OR BEFORE Nov 24th, 2025 AT 11AM EST.**

If interested, you must apply and submit a self tape to:

[[https://projectweather.castingcrane.com/](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fprojectweather.castingcrane.com%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExRmoyQTN1WkVpd09DWEo1cHNydGMGYXBwX2lkEDIyMjAzOTE3ODgyMDA4OTIAAR6LhN05d6ix1OgOvh7lreR-R5qQM3_NsWhLLpkyqN9abaFN3pNIIgYtvrfANg_aem_fX7tMqCIZkGozxOoyfmYtw&h=AT3Vt4lf6hpfrgsVzpogUocpmaHdKZHwUiTcp9DOtRhnS9XzlHWw9N2k0rgv8rYdHticfbQ8m2BJhsN_hlG2Yuz3nXebbUeCx2RuTRmbU3iWiEOn5Sn7elLHVlyWYYNIFWcKRk8&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT1OKvfF98PF23ncsWLot6kPGRlmbxDqQ8GHF2L78gAHGEUj9PdTPnEc97yIsDAGds-YXglEJFeQ1GQVuks14EsVGGA1d6-4t389_hdbMVBz1JQtUKRW1PPugFSpp80qEu_q07KjdHB-Op7cRglq9slv_6nbyV-9Fn1MeC4NabLj)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fprojectweather.castingcrane.com%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExRmoyQTN1WkVpd09DWEo1cHNydGMGYXBwX2lkEDIyMjAzOTE3ODgyMDA4OTIAAR5n7RfGzWGZ6_XTC8947fudMF1Xya7ujo_bS8pAjOUYf70roe04DHg45iL3ig_aem_fwUpTnWr87a8zjmE3lS1og&h=AT3Vt4lf6hpfrgsVzpogUocpmaHdKZHwUiTcp9DOtRhnS9XzlHWw9N2k0rgv8rYdHticfbQ8m2BJhsN_hlG2Yuz3nXebbUeCx2RuTRmbU3iWiEOn5Sn7elLHVlyWYYNIFWcKRk8&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT1OKvfF98PF23ncsWLot6kPGRlmbxDqQ8GHF2L78gAHGEUj9PdTPnEc97yIsDAGds-YXglEJFeQ1GQVuks14EsVGGA1d6-4t389_hdbMVBz1JQtUKRW1PPugFSpp80qEu_q07KjdHB-Op7cRglq9slv_6nbyV-9Fn1MeC4NabLj)

üìÖ 21 November | 12:00 PM | North Hollywood

‚ú® Only 20 participants - selective casting.

We - a partner of TikTok, Entertainment Agency - are filming a professional educational course on TikTok Live Sales.

We are currently selecting students who will:

üéì appear on camera as the classroom audience

üìò and simultaneously receive real training in TikTok Live Sales techniques.

What you will gain:

‚Ä¢ Practical skills for working in TikTok Live

‚Ä¢ A clear understanding of how a selling livestream is structured

‚Ä¢ The possibility of being included in the exclusive creator pool of our agency, working in a professional studio equipped for TikTok livestreams

‚Ä¢ Possible access to various projects within our agency

‚Ä¢ The opportunity to work with exclusive products

‚Ä¢ $60 for participating in the filming day

Why this opportunity is valuable:

‚Ä¢ This is a real chance to enter the TikTok Live Commerce industry.

‚Ä¢ Participants go through a selection process - we choose motivated, attentive, and standout individuals.

‚Ä¢ Filming takes place in a studio format. Please come in a neat yet bright look. Charismatic outfits are very welcome.

üìû To apply, please send:

 1. Your photos

 2. Your TikTok account

via Telegram / WhatsApp / Messenger: 747-286-83-92

Experience is not required - what matters is respect for the process, interest in the industry, and the desire to grow.

items.text:
**URGENT!** **We're looking for two on-camera presenters (Male + Female)! Self-tape required by today - please email crewing@freshcutvideo.co.uk for more details on script.**

***Casting Brief:***

**Project:** AI & Accounting Series
**Format:** Green-screen studio, direct-to-camera delivery
**Location:** London
**Shoot:** 25th November
**Usage:** Online, paid media, client channels
**Rates:** Please provide day rate + buyout (include preparation time for learning scripts)

**Overview**

We are casting **one male** and **one female** presenter capable of confidently portraying professional accountants. The content is aimed at small-business owners and accounting professionals, so performances must feel authentic, warm and knowledgeable.

The series includes:
* **Three longform videos (<90 seconds each)**
* **Three social cutdowns (30 seconds each)**

Scripts to be provided in advance.

**Performance Requirements**
* Strong **direct-to-camera** presence; clear, articulate delivery.
* Ability to speak about **AI, finance, and accounting concepts** with confidence (no technical background required, but must be able to convey authority).
* Natural, human, emotive tone ‚Äì avoid corporate monotone.
* Must be comfortable working with a **teleprompter**, but we‚Äôre ideally looking for actors who can **learn scripts in sections** for a more natural flow.
* Able to take direction quickly for pace, tone and clarity.

**Scripts cover topics such as:**
* AI vs automation
* The future of AI in accounting
* Human-in-the-loop systems
* AI efficiency and audit readiness

**Look & Feel**
* Clean, simple green-screen setup.
* Straight-to-camera.
* Professional, friendly, trustworthy.
* No heavy characterisation ‚Äì this is credible business presentation.

**Casting Specs**

**Female Actor**
* Age: 30‚Äì50
* Style: Professional, approachable, confident
* Smart-casual wardrobe (own clothes)

**Male Actor**
* Age: 30‚Äì50
* Style: Professional, approachable, confident
* Smart-casual wardrobe (own clothes)

**Submissions:**

Please send the following to **crewing@freshcutvideo.co.uk**
* CV / Showreel
* Portfolio
* Availability + rates incl. buyout

items.text:
MANCHESTER UK BASED ONLY

Short film

'he lives here' 

A sleepless corporate worker is forced to confront the monstrous embodiment of their childhood trauma during a terrifying sleep paralysis episode.

A vocalist is needed to compliment the soundtrack for a short film.

Feminine-leaning vocals rooted in harmonising dreamy soundscapes, singing and soft spoken word. 

Inspiration: 

Phoebe Bridgers
Agnes Obel
Ethel Cain 

PLEASE NOTE:
This is a Manchester, UK based opportunity only
Unpaid student film, travel & catering provided

From Writer/Director/Producer Jacob James Ward
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIponbMURSU

Send me a DM or message:
@wardmakesfilms - instagram
jacobward044@gmail.com

Hey everyone! We‚Äôre looking for a few kids (ages 5‚Äì8) to appear in a classroom scene for a thriller feature film shooting tomorrow.

This is a great chance to get your child on the big screen ‚Äî the scene is simple, nothing intense, and every kid will be clearly visible on camera.

items.text:
CASTING CALL ‚Äì FEATURE FILM ‚ÄúTHE CHRISTMAS HE FORGOT‚Äù - Feature Film

‚ÄúThe Christmas He Forgot‚Äù is a romantic drama with a touch of magical realism. Burned-out ad executive Logan Winters is transported by a mysterious snow globe into the memories he left behind, forcing him to face his past and the people he hurt, especially Amelia, his childhood friend and lost love. Set in a cozy, holiday-lit New England town, the story blends nostalgia, gentle magic, and heartfelt emotion as Logan rediscovers what truly matters.

Production states: "Welcome to Pearla LLC, where storytelling meets innovation. Pearla is more than an entertainment brand; it's a creative ecosystem built to inspire, challenge, and connect. Founded with a vision to blend cinematic artistry, technology, and community, Pearla delivers original content through its flagship app, available on Apple TV."

Genre: Romantic Drama / Magical Realism

Location: London, UK

Shoot Dates: 24th November - 7th December (dates might change depending how longer the production will take)

Union/Non-Union: Accepting both

Paid: Yes (lead only)

We are casting all roles for a heartfelt Christmas film full of emotion, nostalgia, and magical realism.

LEAD ROLES

LOGAN WINTERS (Male, 30‚Äì40)
Successful, emotionally distant ad exec who must rediscover the meaning of home and love.ÔøΩStrong emotional range required.

AMELIA LINWOOD (Female, 30‚Äì40)
Warm, resilient baker. Romantic lead. Must show deep emotional layers, gentle humour, and vulnerability.

SUPPORTING ROLES

EMILY WINTERS (Female, 28‚Äì40) ‚Äì Logan‚Äôs caring, quietly wounded sister.
ÔøΩMRS. EVERGREEN (Female, 40‚Äì65) ‚Äì Magic-tinged caf√© owner.
ÔøΩMIRIAM (Female, 20‚Äì30) ‚Äì Logan‚Äôs assistant.
ÔøΩMR. & MRS. WINTERS (40‚Äì65) ‚Äì Logan‚Äôs loving parents.
ÔøΩMRS. LINWOOD (50‚Äì70) ‚Äì Amelia‚Äôs mother (flashbacks).
ÔøΩYOUNG LOGAN (14‚Äì18) ‚Äì Teenage version of the lead.
ÔøΩYOUNG AMELIA (14‚Äì18) ‚Äì Teenage version of the lead.
ÔøΩSTREET SANTA (40‚Äì80) ‚Äì Mysterious, wise presence.

HOW TO SUBMIT

Send the following to: HundoFilm@gmail.com

Headshot
ÔøΩR√©sum√©
ÔøΩSelf-tape link
ÔøΩRole you‚Äôre auditioning for
ÔøΩContact info

Self-tape link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1GJcLkyD6mBT-uqwGFnAWwTaPrZ3oxkWd

Pick the role your applying for and the script for the self-tape will show 

SELF-TAPE DETAILS

‚Ä¢ Film horizontally, clean backgroundÔøΩ‚Ä¢ Good lightingÔøΩ‚Ä¢ Start with a slate

Casting Ends on Monday 24th
Thank you.

CASTING CALL ‚Äì FEATURE FILM ‚ÄúTHE CHRISTMAS HE FORGOT‚Äù - Feature Film

‚ÄúThe Christmas He Forgot‚Äù is a romantic drama with a touch of magical realism. Burned-out ad executive Logan Winters is transported by a mysterious snow globe into the memories he left behind, forcing him to face his past and the people he hurt, especially Amelia, his childhood friend and lost love. Set in a cozy, holiday-lit New England town, the story blends nostalgia, gentle magic, and heartfelt emotion as Logan rediscovers what truly matters.

Production states: "Welcome to Pearla LLC, where storytelling meets innovation. Pearla is more than an entertainment brand; it's a creative ecosystem built to inspire, challenge, and connect. Founded with a vision to blend cinematic artistry, technology, and community, Pearla delivers original content through its flagship app, available on Apple TV."

Genre: Romantic Drama / Magical Realism

ÔøΩLocation: London, UK
ÔøΩShoot Dates: 24th November - 7th December (dates might change depending how longer the production will take)
ÔøΩUnion/Non-Union: Accepting both
ÔøΩPaid: Yes (lead only)

We are casting all roles for a heartfelt Christmas film full of emotion, nostalgia, and magical realism.

LEAD ROLES

LOGAN WINTERS (Male, 30‚Äì40)
Successful, emotionally distant ad exec who must rediscover the meaning of home and love.
ÔøΩStrong emotional range required.

AMELIA LINWOOD (Female, 30‚Äì40)
Warm, resilient baker. Romantic lead. Must show deep emotional layers, gentle humour, and vulnerability.

SUPPORTING ROLES

EMILY WINTERS (Female, 28‚Äì40) ‚Äì Logan‚Äôs caring, quietly wounded sister.
ÔøΩMRS. EVERGREEN (Female, 40‚Äì65) ‚Äì Magic-tinged caf√© owner.
ÔøΩMIRIAM (Female, 20‚Äì30) ‚Äì Logan‚Äôs assistant.
ÔøΩMR. & MRS. WINTERS (40‚Äì65) ‚Äì Logan‚Äôs loving parents.
ÔøΩMRS. LINWOOD (50‚Äì70) ‚Äì Amelia‚Äôs mother (flashbacks).
ÔøΩYOUNG LOGAN (14‚Äì18) ‚Äì Teenage version of the lead.
ÔøΩYOUNG AMELIA (14‚Äì18) ‚Äì Teenage version of the lead.
ÔøΩSTREET SANTA (40‚Äì80) ‚Äì Mysterious, wise presence.

HOW TO SUBMIT

Send the following to: HundoFilm@gmail.com

Headshot
ÔøΩR√©sum√©
ÔøΩSelf-tape link
ÔøΩRole you‚Äôre auditioning for
ÔøΩContact info

Self-tape link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1GJcLkyD6mBT-uqwGFnAWwTaPrZ3oxkWd

Pick the role your applying for and the script for the self-tape will show 

SELF-TAPE DETAILS

‚Ä¢ Film horizontally, clean backgroundÔøΩ‚Ä¢ Good lightingÔøΩ‚Ä¢ Start with a slate

Casting Ends on Monday 24th
Thank you.

CASTING CALL

Rose Waite Studio is looking for male cyclists for a major brand campaign: 40‚Äì50, Caucasian, Male, No Visible Tattoos

Filming: 27th November in East London
Talent must be London-based or have a London base. No previous experience needed to apply.

Paid opportunity ‚Äì ¬£400 BSF / ¬£3500 Usage*

Please note: as this is a campaign about peak performance, we‚Äôre looking for athletes with great form at the peak of their game.

Self tapes will require cycling on an exercise bike so talent must be comfortable with performing using training equipment and wearing tight-fitted clothing that show form, tone and muscles.

To apply, please email stories@rosewaite.com with the subject ‚ÄòCyclist ‚Äì Campaign‚Äô. Please include full name, age, location, selfie and a short intro.

*for those selected and appearing in final campaign

**PAID CASTING CALL**

Production: Short Film 

Union: Non-Union

Location: Colorado (Looking for Locals)

Rate: $800/day - Full Buyout/No Residuals/No Travel or Accommodations

Length: 1 Day Shoot

Dates: TBD (Early/Mid December)

**‚Ä¢ Mother and Daughter**
* Mother: Between the ages of 55 and 75
* Daughter: Between the ages of 20 and 30

Looking for singles to be paired together as well as legitimate mother/daughter combos. Emotional range is crucial. Acting experience is preferred. Our team will provide more details during the next step of casting.

**‚Ä¢ Retired Couple**
* Female: Between the ages of 60 and 85
* Male: Between the ages of 60 and 85

Looking for singles to be paired together as well as legitimate couples. Emotional range is crucial. Acting experience is preferred. Our team will provide more details during the next step of casting.

* Recent headshots and photos

items.text:
‚Ä¢CASTING CALL ‚Äì INDEPENDENT FEATURE FILM 
Project Title: The Weight of Yesterday 
Production Type: Independent Feature Film
Shoot Dates: December 5th - 7th
Location: Denver, CO 
Compensation: $500/day + Reel + IMDb Credit

SYNOPSIS:
A week before their high school‚Äôs final closure, five classmates reunite to bury a time capsule they created years ago. What begins as a nostalgic farewell quickly spirals into a raw confrontation of the truths, betrayals, and dreams that shaped their youth and the adulthood that awaits.
NOW CASTING ‚Äì LEAD & SUPPORTING ROLES:

 LEAD ROLES:
Aiden (Male, 18‚Äì23)
Ambitious, witty, and fiercely protective. A natural leader haunted by a decision he made senior year that fractured the group.

Riley (Female, 18‚Äì24)
Intelligent and emotionally layered. She‚Äôs the planner of the reunion, but secretly fears what might resurface. Carries herself with quiet authority.

Lana (Female, 19‚Äì25)
Charming and impulsive with a magnetic presence. Struggles with stability and hides vulnerability behind a fearless exterior.

SUPPORTING ROLES:
Tessa (Female, 18‚Äì23)
Reserved, observant, and deeply reflective. Once the outsider of the group, she now holds crucial pieces of the past they all want to forget.

Ms. Grant (Female, 30s‚Äì40s)
A former teacher turned school counselor. Warm, insightful, and a mentor to many, but carries her own regrets about the group‚Äôs final year.

TO SUBMIT:
Email your headshot, resume, and city of residence to:
everlastfilming@gmail.com 

Subject line: ‚Äú[Your Name] ‚Äì Role Submission for The Weight of Yesterday ‚Äù

topComments.text:
This is a scam. How clueless can people be. 
Legit Feature films do not shoot in three days 
They do not engage in business with a generic Gmail account 
And they don't ask your city of residence

items.text:
Hi!

I am an acting teacher living between NYC and Paris and I am so excited to be launching my new acting program in Paris! I have been an acting teacher at the Yale School of Drama for over 13 years & I have brought together some of the most outstanding teachers for our first summer - and there are more to come!

Please spread the word?! 

So many opportunities to train in play, clown, voice and movement, and physical acting this Winter and Spring in NYC & Paris! || 

www.theplaysociety.org

items.text:
üî• ATTENTION FILMMAKERS, DIRECTORS & INDIE PRODUCERS üî•

My name is Jerry Valentino Wright ‚Äî published author of 11 books and creator of multiple cinematic universes that are READY to be adapted to film.

I‚Äôm seeking one serious, visionary producer or small production company who sees potential where others see limits ‚Äî someone who wants to help bring a powerful, original franchise to life.

I have several finished books that are visually explosive, emotionally gripping, and built for the screen, including:

üé¨ The Eternal War: Light vs Darkness ‚Äî
A supernatural action-drama with apocalyptic tension, angelic warfare, moral conflict, and a lead character whose destiny shifts the balance between Heaven and Hell.

üé¨ Edge of the Block (series) ‚Äî
Urban, gritty, raw, perfect for a streaming series or limited-run Netflix-style drama.

üé¨ No Mercy Left, The Last Revelation, The Final Prophecy ‚Äî
End-times thrillers with cinematic visuals, spiritual depth, and blockbuster potential.

These aren‚Äôt ‚Äúideas.‚Äù
These are published works, already moving thousands of readers ‚Äî stories built with character arcs, emotional weight, and world-building filmmakers dream about.

I‚Äôm looking for the RIGHT partner:
üëâ A producer with vision
üëâ A director who loves building new worlds
üëâ An indie studio hungry for original IP
üëâ Someone who wants to turn books into films with real impact

If you‚Äôre interested in reading the logline, synopsis, or treatment ‚Äî or if you‚Äôre a filmmaker who loves collaborating with authors ‚Äî comment below or DM me directly.

Let‚Äôs build something legendary.
Let‚Äôs create a film people will feel, not just watch.

‚Äî Jerry Valentino Wright
Author | Creator | Visionary Storyteller

items.text:
üé¨ **CASTING CALL ‚Äì SOCIAL MEDIA CAMPAIGN (PAID)**
Casting multiple lifestyle roles for a social media video campaign shot in Johannesburg / Pretoria. All roles are paid. Seeking authentic talent with real, natural energy.

üìÖ **Production Date:** Late November 2025 (exact dates TBC)
‚è≥ **Submission Deadline:** ASAP
üìç **Location:** Johannesburg / Pretoria, South Africa
üí∞ **Pay:** Paid (rates discussed upon selection)
üè∑ **Union Status:** Not Applicable
üé• **Production Type:** Social Media Campaign

---

### **ROLES AVAILABLE**

üé≠ **Braai Host (30‚Äì55, any gender)**
Warm, relatable South African energy. Must be comfortable prepping food, handling braai grid/tongs, and interacting naturally in a backyard scene.

üé£ **River Angler (28‚Äì50, any gender)**
Outdoorsy and calm. Should be comfortable mimicking fly-fishing movements and walking on uneven riverbank terrain.

ü•æ **Hiker / Camper (20‚Äì35, any gender)**
Active, capable vibe. Will tie guylines, prep kindling, and perform light camp tasks in a scenic ridge/tent scene.

üöú **Farmer / Farmhand (30‚Äì65, any gender)**
Authentic rural presence. Will appear in a field/shed scene doing light fence work, twine cutting, or walking crop rows.

---

### **SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS**

üì∏ Headshot (natural light)
üì∑ Full-length photo

items.text:
We‚Äôre looking for talented female performers to join our team as the K-Pop Demon Hunters characters ‚Äì Rumi, Zoey & Mira!

You‚Äôll be bringing these high-energy, magical characters to life at children‚Äôs parties, home visits, and special events

üé§ What‚Äôs Involved:

Performing as your assigned character (costumes & wigs provided)

Singing, dancing, and interacting with children

Hosting fun party games and activities

Creating unforgettable memories for kids!

üíÉ Requirements:

Good dance level and some singing experience

Confident, fun, and great with children

Valid DBS check and experience working with kids

Available every Saturday & Sunday (with some weekday events too)

Immediate start available

üí∞ Pay Rates:

¬£200 ‚Äì 2-hour party

¬£130 ‚Äì 1-hour party

¬£60‚Äì 30-minute visit

üëó Costumes and wigs are fully provided ‚Äì just bring your talent and energy!

If you love performing, adore kids, and want to be part of something magical, apply now!

Send us a message with your name, experience, DBS status, availability, and a short performance clip (if possible).

items.text:
MANCHESTER UK BASED ONLY

Short film

'he lives here' 

A sleepless corporate worker is forced to confront the monstrous embodiment of their childhood trauma during a terrifying sleep paralysis episode.

A vocalist is needed to compliment the soundtrack for a short film.

Feminine-leaning vocals rooted in harmonising dreamy soundscapes, singing and soft spoken word. 

Inspiration: 

Phoebe Bridgers
Agnes Obel
Ethel Cain 

PLEASE NOTE:
This is a Manchester, UK based opportunity only
Unpaid student film, travel & catering provided

From Writer/Director/Producer Jacob James Ward
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIponbMURSU

Send me a DM or message:
@wardmakesfilms - instagram
jacobward044@gmail.com

items.text:
‚ú® Free Try-it VIRTUAL Voice Lessons + 40% Off Your First Month! (Black Friday Special!) ‚ú®

Hi everyone! I‚Äôm Colleen, a voice & piano teacher and mompreneur, the owner of Virtuoso Studios. We have an amazing team of supportive, talented teachers who work with students of all ages and experience levels. Whether you‚Äôre preparing for auditions, looking to build technique, or just getting started, we welcome you to join us! 

For Black Friday, we‚Äôre offering 40% off your first month of lessons (4 lessons!)Your first lesson is completely free to try before making any commitment. If you decide to continue, that free lesson will count toward your discounted month. 

We offer lessons in voice, piano, violin, viola, cello, guitar, and acting, taught virtual via Zoom! 

If you‚Äôd like to try a free lesson, you can sign up here:  [www.virtuosostudios.org/free-trial-lessons](https://www.virtuosostudios.org/free-trial-lessons)

DM me if you have any questions!

items.text:
*Michael Chekhov Europe* invites you to its first workshop in the new year: 

**THE MOVING SPACE: Atmosphere and Playfulness on Stage **

with **David Zinder**, Tel Aviv, **Vladimir Baicher**, Moscow, **Suzana Nikoliƒá**, Zagreb, **Ulrich Meyer-Horsch**, Hamburg

**January 29 to February 1, 2026 **in Hamburg, Germany 

The space on stage is full of life, full of energy and breath. All an actor has to do is connect to this living space. 

What happens when we dive into the world of a given play and allow ourselves to be surprised by its specific dynamics, energy, language and space? 

Michael Chekhov‚Äôs concepts of ‚ÄúAtmosphere‚Äù (‚Äúthe soul of every performance‚Äù) and ‚ÄúThe Feeling of Ease, Form, Beauty and the Whole‚Äù will guide us through this exploration. 

*Movement in Space ‚Äì Objective Atmosphere ‚Äì Spatial Relationship ‚Äì Personal Atmosphere ‚Äì Feeling of Ease, Form, Beauty and the Whole ‚Äì Organic breathing ‚Äì Playfulness ‚Äì Ensemble *

Michael Chekhov Europe Training ‚Äì module 2

Tuition fee: 450‚Ç¨ / 490‚Ç¨

More information: [[https://sfsh.de/michael-chekhov-module-2/sfsh10037/](https://sfsh.de/michael-chekhov-module-2/sfsh10037/?fbclid=IwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAc3J0YwZhcHBfaWQQMjIyMDM5MTc4ODIwMDg5MghjYWxsc2l0ZQEyAAEeY52GI3lQe3pjPHhDXowpGuLqIQrzJcqGyZcZh3SR3jGKGPx3ohVQgDBpaaY_aem_LqlofjR6f5SXrNzWnHvQPg&brid=aB9vxtDqrKES53cnQp0y_A)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fsfsh.de%2Fmichael-chekhov-module-2%2Fsfsh10037%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAc3J0YwZhcHBfaWQQMjIyMDM5MTc4ODIwMDg5MghjYWxsc2l0ZQEyAAEex7NVSBwXFESZYv0PnNVOZZnSrzpDqZTYYyPIFJFP5nZT3Q26Ztt6WS-2fEA_aem_avdglXTU1DOTHvEm2ODLWw%26brid%3DkHUv4f1OfBXrKWr9lBtxHA&h=AT3aprJLj6mz3iCe_wMtmzrhtZGIayz1KSnpU58Ex7Z3EzPlrdAAC1KuqKpynOGfS5EK5Ig9QN83EuaeroAfCpArCXGbw_dimFyj16sIOeaPH6rPkuzKw_HUwj0Asyp3ugyfD65FobRJTmjdHtFUjy3Q2Q&__tn__=-UK-R&c[0]=AT0HA0NarzIKKHpcfuGCk_r7lozXPeUvPcNPcopwlZ-UI1byChoQ3du3h8W5ximHzMBhAEXGkb_bl8TQatSz2VHJa7jDl-KVLtmeALpkJ1DA_bE9mEexuYkjuWUew5yTen0VdKvkkNsZpaSC4X3beQM387ABsSrCYXTYojujQlQB)

Contact: chekhov@sfsh.de 

This in-person workshop can be acknowledged as part of the upcoming MICHA/MCE Teachers Training.

items.title: Christine Sclafani | Actress, Producer, Writer

topComments.text:
You look great Christine!   I‚Äôm a bestselling author and SAG actor. My first memoir was planned for a film and hoping on getting my other books going. Check out my book The Diary of a Manic OCD Book seller (11 dollars) as in my quirky memoir how I got an agent, a publisher, and a movie deal all while living in my car. If you like dark comedy road trips check out Almost Texas my second book. Oscar winner Mel Brooks has blurbs on both. Almost Texas is 99 cents on kindle or 12 in books. Let me know?
https://www.amazon.com/Diary-Manic-OCD-Bookseller/dp/B08ZFDPS3Q
https://www.amazon.com/Almost-Texas-James-Bailey/dp/1490324259

items.text:
Hello! Would you like to be an extra on a student film project? This is your opportunity!

I'm looking for actors for my SFU 4th year Capstone film "Coiled Like the Wolf."

This will be a two-day shoot from **November 21 - November 22. Come either or both days!**

Monetary compensation will not be provided, but you will get free food!

Feel free to bring your friends! The more the merrier!

Email me at **mimnom@icloud.com **if you're interested!

SPEND A FEW HOURS HANGING OUT AND BEING AN EXTRA ON A STUDENT FILM SET! UNPAID SNACKS WILL BE SERVED EMAIL MIMNOM@ICLOUD.COM IF YOU'RE INTERESTED!'

Deine Bernadetteüé∂

items.text:
Hello, I‚Äôm looking for a few actors in the Manchester area or nearby to work on an independent psychological thriller short film shooting next month! Find all the info below.

If you are interested, please email me: abbiegeorgefilm@outlook.com

Thank you so much! ü§ó

attachments.ocrText: May be an image of text that says 'CASTING CALL FOR 10-MINUTE SHORT FILM "DO YOU DESERVE IT?" GENRE: PSYCHOLOGICAL THRILLER LOCATION: MANCHESTER -SHOOTING DAYS BETWEEN 11TH-15TH DECEMBER TRANSPORTATION/ AND CATERING COSTS COVERED THESE ROLES ARE UNPAID THE PATIENT LEAD CHARACTER A young man struggling with depression and his current lethargic state. Uncertain of the help available o him and wary of his future. REQUIREMENTS: Male -presenting/ Male actor Age: Early-Mid 20s IF INTERESTED, EMAIL: ABBIEGEORGEFILMEOUTLOOK.COM WITH THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION: HEADSHOTS SHOWREEL LOCATION ANY OTHER RELEVANT MATERIALS DEADLINE: DEADLINE:FRID FRIDAY 28TH NOV SELF-TAPES TAKING PLACE THE FOLLOWING WEEK'

items.text:
Tonight and tomorrow only at No Square Theatre in Laguna Beach!

Get your tickets at: [https://www.tix.com/ticket-sales/nosquare/1804](https://www.tix.com/ticket-sales/nosquare/1804?fbclid=IwZXh0bgNhZW0CMTAAYnJpZBExdE9CMUlNdmlWaHQ1Z0hXRHNydGMGYXBwX2lkDzUxNDc3MTU2OTIyODA2MQABHhigjsOFZIS1vnXu10jY_YsHWJ5nXvz5lgiqWRc5_TvZ_pxZxMayZs6Vc-tX_aem_Qgp-5aGk8mHoi59iA-L5bQ)

SHE KILLS MONSTERS: YOUNG ADVENTURERS EDITION, a play by Qui Nguyen and directed by No Square Theatre Artistic Director, Joe Lauderdale, tells the story of high schooler Agnes Evans as she deals with the death of her younger sister, Tilly. When Agnes finds Tilly‚Äôs Dungeons & Dragons notebook, she gets pulled into an exciting adventure in the imaginary world that was her sister‚Äôs escape. The story is a thrilling, fast-paced dramatic comedy laden with homicidal fairies, nasty ogres, and ‚Äô90s pop culture celebrating both the geek and the warrior inside all of us.

November 22 & 23 Only!

attachments.ocrText: May be an image of text that says 'NOSOUARETHEATRE NO SOUARE THEATRE SHE KILLS MONSTERS 1 NGUYEN YOUNG ADVENTURERS EDITION BY Sydney Schaarsmith Marina Strombom Agnes Tilly Amelia Wittkop Chuck Sam O'Neil Miles Alyssa Julien Kaliope/ Kelly Malia Cherie Dull Lilith/Lilly Rory Baskin Evil Tina/Farrah Arabella Bryson Orcus Beatrise Luu Vera/Evil Gabbi/ The Beholder NOVEMBER 22ND 22ND-23RD nosquare.ora Logan Pearson Steve'

message.text:
üé¨ Unleash Your Acting Potential with Sarfraz Khan! üé≠

Dream of commanding the stage or shining on screen? Our acting academy is your gateway to mastering the craft! Whether you're a beginner or an experienced performer, we provide world-class training, hands-on workshops, and real performance opportunities to polish your talent.

‚ú® Why Choose Us?
‚úÖ Learn from industry veteran Sarfraz Khan s/o Kader Khan (Theatre & Film)
‚úÖ Build confidence, technique & artistic expression
‚úÖ Perform in live shows & productions
‚úÖ Personalized coaching for stage & screen acting

"Acting is not about pretending‚Äîit‚Äôs about becoming." ‚Äì Let us help you transform into the actor you‚Äôre meant to be!

üì¢ Limited Seats Available! Enroll Now & Step Into the Spotlight!

#ActingSchool #BecomeAnActor #ActingClasses #DreamBig #KaderKhan #SarfrazKhan #TheatreTraining #FilmActing #ActingCoach #PerformanceArt #DramaSchool #ActingDreams #StageToScreen #ActorLife #CreativeJourney #UnleashYourTalent

üìò and simultaneously receive real training in TikTok Live Sales techniques.

What you will gain:

‚Ä¢ Possible access to various projects within our agency
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to work with exclusive products

Why this opportunity is valuable:
‚Ä¢ This is a real chance to enter the TikTok Live Commerce industry.

‚Ä¢ Filming takes place in a studio format. Please come in a neat yet bright look. Charismatic outfits are very welcome.

üìû To apply, please send:
 1. Your photos

via Telegram / WhatsApp / Messenger: 747-286-83-92 Karina

Experience is not required - what matters is respect for the process, interest in the industry, and the desire to grow.

items.text:
LA Actors looking to star in a comedy! 

Chewing Gum x The Mindy Project x  Bridget Jones‚Äô Diary x New Girl x Crashing

Sick of the bleak reality of modern dating & inspired by unrealistic expectations set by the rom coms that raised her, delusional romantic Mika decides to take her love life into her own hands - and she‚Äôll do anything to orchestrate the perfect romance.

This is for the lovers and the cynics‚Äîa character-driven situational comedy that‚Äôs both a love letter and critique of the rom-coms that raised us.

-JAN 30th - Feb 1st
-West LA/Ventura
-Non-Union
-Unpaid Passion Project (Credit, Meals, Priority Consideration on Paid Pilot/series)

üíå  If you‚Äôre interested in feeling good, laughing loud, and making the kind of comedy we‚Äôve been missing then submit now!

attachments.ocrText: May be a graphic of text that says "Actors! This is It. If you ve been thinking about submitting. this is your sign. Deadline to submit for Comedy Series Short, Crushed, is tomorrow, NOV 215t at 11:59 PM."
May be a graphic of television and text

May be a graphic of ‚Äétext that says "‚ÄéÿπŸà MIKA MID 20S To EARLY 30S I BLACK FEMALE Rom-Com raised daydreaming LA-Native Mika is on a mission to find the "One" by any means neccassary. She's a lover girl through and through (Think Bridget from Bridget Jones' Diary, Jess from New Girl, Mindy Lahiri from The Mindy Project, or Tracey from Chewing Gum). Energetic, goofy. painfully persistent, and delusionally optimistic. Mika believes in love even though she's never been in love. So she gets it wrong- lot. She's earnest. crafty, and will do whatever it takes to orchastrate the perfect romance. BONUS: IMPROV, COMEDY, AND DRAMA EXPERIENCE‚Äé"‚Äé
May be a graphic of text

May be an image of hotdog and text that says "LATE 20S to MID 30S ·ûá·ûè HOT DOG-PARK PARK GUY ANY ETHNICITY I MALE Mika's latest crush that she encounters at the Dog Park. A handsome man with an equally handsome Dog. More statue than man, practically etched from marble. brought some Southern charm with him when he moved to LA. He' laid back, bashful and flirty. Perfect on paper, but not all he seems. He's BONUS: IMPROV AND (PHYSICAL) COMEDY EXPERIENCE"

topComments.text:
Unless it's a student production ALWAYS pay your cast and crew!

Start a crowdfunding campaign, apply for grants that align with the series' message, take out a personal bank loan, hold bake sales and car washes, meet with local/regional businesses for product placement.

Even Spike Lee, before he was "Spike Lee" got financing for his first film "She's Gotta Have It" when no one even knew who Spike Lee was..But STOP this practice of expecting Actors and Crew to work for free on your films.

What about liability insurance to cover the cast and crew on set? A film set is a place where a lot of incidents could happen. What if they get hurt on set? How are you going to compensate them for their medical expenses and lost work time? How are you going to cover equipment damaged or lost to such a situation? What if the property (house, offices, vase, etc. ) gets damaged, how are you going to cover those expenses?

What about a completion bond to insure the film is finished or pay the people for their time if it's not? Do you have that? 

My point is you have to start treating your business as a BUSINESS and stop expecting cast and crew to work for free. Filmmaking isn't just shooting footage on set and cutting it together in post. Part of filmmaking is finding the funding to make a film. And if you don't want to do that legwork then you don't really want to be in the film industry.

items.text:
My name is Jerry Valentino Wright ‚Äî published author of 11 books and creator of multiple cinematic universes that are READY to be adapted to film.

I‚Äôm seeking one serious, visionary producer or small production company who sees potential where others see limits ‚Äî someone who wants to help bring a powerful, original franchise to life.

I have several finished books that are visually explosive, emotionally gripping, and built for the screen, including:

üé¨ The Eternal War: Light vs Darkness ‚Äî
A supernatural action-drama with apocalyptic tension, angelic warfare, moral conflict, and a lead character whose destiny shifts the balance between Heaven and Hell.

üé¨ Edge of the Block (series) ‚Äî
Urban, gritty, raw, perfect for a streaming series or limited-run Netflix-style drama.

üé¨ No Mercy Left, The Last Revelation, The Final Prophecy ‚Äî
End-times thrillers with cinematic visuals, spiritual depth, and blockbuster potential.

These aren‚Äôt ‚Äúideas.‚Äù
These are published works, already moving thousands of readers ‚Äî stories built with character arcs, emotional weight, and world-building filmmakers dream about.

I‚Äôm looking for the RIGHT partner:
üëâ A producer with vision
üëâ A director who loves building new worlds
üëâ An indie studio hungry for original IP
üëâ Someone who wants to turn books into films with real impact

If you‚Äôre interested in reading the logline, synopsis, or treatment ‚Äî or if you‚Äôre a filmmaker who loves collaborating with authors ‚Äî comment below or DM me directly.

Let‚Äôs build something legendary.
Let‚Äôs create a film people will feel, not just watch.

items.groupTitle: LA Actors, Agents, Casting Directors, Producers
items.summary:
My name is Jerry Valentino Wright ‚Äî published author of 11 books and creator of multiple cinematic universes that are READY to be adapted to film.

I‚Äôm seeking one serious, visionary producer or small production company who sees potential where others see limits ‚Äî someone who wants to help bring a powerful, original franchise to life.

I have several finished books that are visually explosive, emotionally gripping, and built for the screen, including:

üé¨ The Eternal War: Light vs Darkness ‚Äî
A supernatural action-drama with apocalyptic tension, angelic warfare, moral conflict, and a lead character whose destiny shifts the balance between Heaven and Hell.

üé¨ Edge of the Block (series) ‚Äî
Urban, gritty, raw, perfect for a streaming series or limited-run Netflix-style drama.

üé¨ No Mercy Left, The Last Revelation, The Final Prophecy ‚Äî
End-times thrillers with cinematic visuals, spiritual depth, and blockbuster potential.

These aren‚Äôt ‚Äúideas.‚Äù
These are published works, already moving thousands of readers ‚Äî stories built with character arcs, emotional weight, and world-building filmmakers dream about.

I‚Äôm looking for the RIGHT partner:
üëâ A producer with vision
üëâ A director who loves building new worlds
üëâ An indie studio hungry for original IP
üëâ Someone who wants to turn books into films with real impact

If you‚Äôre interested in reading the logline, synopsis, or treatment ‚Äî or if you‚Äôre a filmmaker who loves collaborating with authors ‚Äî comment below or DM me directly.

Let‚Äôs build something legendary.
Let‚Äôs create a film people will feel, not just watch.

‚Äî Jerry Valentino Wright
Author | Creator | Visionary Storyteller

items.text:
Casting Call üéâüéâüéâ

‚ÄòThe Lines We Crossed‚Äô short film üé¨

A raw and tender story of found family, the messiness of healing, and the unexpected power of being seen. Three lives, stitched together by loneliness, come alive in the light of connection - and in that light, hope can take root where none was meant to grow.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Secondary role: Mrs Habib, Deva's mother, was once warm and loving, but grief has reshaped her. She struggles to see her son as she once did and can no longer be the nurturing presence he longs for. Her heart turned stone cold, after the death of her only daughter, she now suppresses her maternal instincts.

Female
30-55 years
Middle Eastern heritage

Shooting date: 08/12/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Secondary role: Mrs. Kane is dramatic, flirty, and unapologetically over-the-top, with a flair for gossip and a love of all things a little chavvy. While she loves both of her children, her eldest, Cody, is clearly the favorite - her pride and joy - often leaving Keira to fend for herself. Mrs. Kane desperately clings to Cody's success, seeing it as her ticket to status and financial security.

Female
30-55 years
White/Caucasian
London accent

Shooting date: 06/12/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Extra: Marty is the friendly local shopkeeper who's known the Kane family for years. He's the kind of man who hears all the town gossip but never lets a word slip. With his quick wit and easy smile, this cheeky chappy brings warmth and quiet support to everyone who crosses his path.

Male
50-70 years
White/Caucasian

Shooting date: 29/11/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Deadline: 26/11/2025 at 12pm GMT

To audition please contact @lines_we_crossed_film on instagram or Madeleine Bloore here on Facebook.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

sharedPost.text:
Sharing on behalf of BetweenGigs Casting!!

New Hampshire Casting Call for Union & Non-Union Actors!!

Casting is NOT restricted to New England!! 

Casting for a Sci-Fi trailer.

Casting two actors for a proof-of-concept trailer for an episodic sci-fi thriller. It will be shot at the state of the art Studio Lab facility in Derry NH in mid January. This is a paid gig. Both union and non union talent may submit. A Travel/Lodging budget is available, should talent cast be from outside the New England market.

Please see the details below and submit your materials to casting@humanoriginals.com by end of day Sunday, November 23. Please include contact information for your agent or manager if you have one.

************
Project Title: Resonance: Earth 101
Project Type: Proof-of-Concept Trailer
Union: SAG-AFTRA (Micro-Budget Agreement Pending): Roles are open to both union & non union actors.
Production Company: HumanOriginals
Usage: Online, and client/investor/distributer presentations

Shoot Dates: Two days. Tentatively scheduled for January 13 & 14 2026

Shoot Location: Studio Lab, Derry NH

Fit Date/Table Read: TBD. A stipend will be available
Tech Rehearsal Dates (1-2): TBD. A stipend will be available
Travel Stipend/Lodging: TBD, depending on talent's travel distance.

Shoot/Usage Compensation: $1,000/day per talent.
Meals, credit, and copy will also be provided.

SYNOPSIS
Resonance: Earth 101 is a sci-fi thriller proof-of-concept trailer.

Shortly after crashing on Earth in 1983, Kara discovers a mysterious VHS tape in an abandoned warehouse. This triggers a recorded message from Josh, a Brooklyn teen who seems to know her story, even before they‚Äôve met. Through his nervous humor, warnings about Earth, and a mixtape he calls ‚ÄúEarth 101", Josh offers Kara both survival tools and an unexpected connection.

ROLES
JOSH
‚Ä¢ Male, 18‚Äì25, Black or Mixed Ethnicity
‚Ä¢ A hidden tech prodigy from 1983 Brooklyn ‚Äî sharp, curious, and socially awkward, hiding brilliance behind sarcasm. Nervous yet magnetic. He risks everything to help Kara find her way on Earth.

KARA
‚Ä¢ Female, 18‚Äì25, Black or Mixed Ethnicity
‚Ä¢ A resilient and observant young woman carrying a maturity beyond her years. Athletic and graceful, Kara looks both innocent and ancient, as though she‚Äôs already written into myth. Her arrival on Earth sets off an unexpected chain of events.

SUBMISSION INSTRUCTIONS
To be considered for an audition, please email headshot (or current photo), resume, and reel (if available) to casting@humanoriginals.com.

Subject Line of your email should read: Role name / Your name

Submissions are requested by 5:00pm Sunday, November 23. 

If selected to audition, instructions & script for a self-taped audition will be sent to you.

Callbacks, if needed, will be via Zoom.

items.text:
Hello I'm based in Edinburgh and I'm writing to enquire if anybody is interested in networking? I'm a screenwriter mainly but open to do more.

I have a few features written, a series and a handful of shorts.

Please send a message if you're interested in discussing film projects that can lead to potentially making **something**.

items.text:
**CASTING CALL ‚Äî Vancouver, BC**
Looking for actors (18+) to play *16‚Äì18* for a 4th-year Capilano University short film titled **BOYISH**.

A coming-of-age story about the messy shift from boyhood to adulthood, dumb dares, and the people we meet along the way.

**ROLES:**
**LUKA (lead)** ‚Äî male-presenting, playing 16‚Äì18. Quiet, awkward, observant.
**YAZ (lead)** ‚Äî male-presenting, playing 16‚Äì18. Bright, restless, warm.

**Union + Non-Union welcome (volunteer)**
**Filming:** Feb 7‚Äì9, 2026 (Vancouver)
**Actors must be 18+**

To submit, send headshot + reel to **boyish2026@gmail.com** by **Dec 1st, 2025 ‚Äì 11:59pm**.
Subject line: **BOYISH ‚Äì LUKA** or **BOYISH ‚Äì YAZ**

Posty takowe bƒôdƒô te≈º RƒòCZNIE ZATWIERDZA≈Å. Ta czynno≈õƒá spowoduje pewne po≈õlizgi, ale gwarantujƒô, ≈ºe bƒôdƒÖ one w akceptowalnych ramach czasowych.

 

>>>> Dlaczego taki krok? <<<<

Osoby zwiƒÖzane z bran≈ºƒÖ filmowƒÖ zawsze musia≈Çy od czego≈õ zaczynaƒá. Decyzja o pierwszym kroku zawsze zale≈ºy od sytuacji, w kt√≥rej siƒô go robi. W takim momencie okazuje siƒô, ≈ºe strach jest jak najbardziej naturalny, ale ju≈º nie decydujƒÖcy, a pokonywanie go sprawia, ≈ºe chce siƒô to robiƒá dalej. Wtedy poka≈ºesz, na co Ciƒô staƒá.

Jeszcze inny osobnik, z kt√≥rym nie mia≈Çem si≈Çy gadaƒá w niewybredny spos√≥b wypowiedzia≈Ç siƒô o autorce posta. W/w autorka posta spotka≈Ça siƒô z jednym komentarzem, na kt√≥ry zareagowa≈Çem. Zareagowa≈Çy te≈º trole, kt√≥re na zasadzie solidarno≈õci ma≈Çp, czy te≈º swojej niewiedzy stawali siƒô w reakcjach typowymi ‚Äû≈õmieszkami‚Äù. To do≈õƒá wymowne, ale pozostawiam to Waszym przemy≈õleniom.

Jest to forma eksperymentowania z technikƒÖ, stylem i tre≈õciƒÖ, kt√≥ra mo≈ºe przybieraƒá r√≥≈ºne gatunki: fabularny, dokumentalny lub animowany.‚Äù. W ramach takowej produkcji mo≈ºecie liczyƒá na to, na co pozwala bud≈ºet studencki. Bardzo czƒôsto jest to prawdziwa wdziƒôczno≈õƒá. Czasem ciep≈Çy posi≈Çek, lub zaproszenie na emisjƒô w ramach jakiego≈õ konkursu. Je≈õli dla Ciebie to za ma≈Ço, to omi≈Ñ takowy post szerokim ≈Çukiem.

Pamiƒôtaj te≈º, ≈ºe ≈ºadna agencja nie prosi o nagie zdjƒôcia t≈ÇumaczƒÖc to np. tym, ≈ºe kto≈õ musi wiedzieƒá jak bƒôdziesz wyglƒÖdaƒá w stroju kƒÖpielowym, lub w scenie gwa≈Çtu dla Netflixa. Nikt nie prosi te≈º o zdjƒôcia w bieli≈∫nie, chyba, ≈ºe to polaroidy, ale i wtedy nale≈ºy sprawdziƒá agencjƒô. Gdy kto≈õ Ci odm√≥wi udzielania takich informacji, to musisz wiedzieƒá, ≈ºe to wa≈Ç. Das 13 Seitige Manifest √ºber Schauspielrei
# **MANIFEST DES SCHAUSPIELERS

Der Bote zwischen den Welten**
## **1. Pr√§ambel ‚Äì Das Erwachen des Schauspielers**

Ich bin Schauspieler. **Shogun Peter Lakshmi a.d.H. Wehrli**
Doch ich bin mehr als ein Darsteller, mehr als ein K√∂rper auf einer B√ºhne.
Ich bin ein Resonanzraum, ein Spiegel der Zeit, ein Tr√§ger von Botschaften.
Ich betrete nicht Rollen ‚Äì
ich betrete Realit√§ten.

**Meine Aufgabe ist nicht, zu imitieren.**
**Meine Aufgabe ist, zu *****offenbaren*****.**

Wenn ich spreche,
spreche ich nicht nur Worte ‚Äì
ich √∂ffne Tore.

**Wenn ich spiele,**
**spiele ich nicht nur Figuren ‚Äì**
**ich bewege Bewusstsein.**

**weiter lesen unter diesem Link**

https://diegoldenezeit-shogunwehrli.jimdofree.com/das-golden-zeitalter/

Charismatic on the sur- face, violent underneath. coward masked as bully. Worn down and trapped in denial. Loves her children but lacks the strength to protect them. Gruff ex-biker mentor. As Jay struggles to stay out of trouble, old loyalties and buried rage threaten to drag him back into violence. ***COMMERCIAL CASTING CALL***

We‚Äôre looking for real dads with adult children separated by distance (different country, university etc.) who connect over their love of football for a commercial.

The commercial will be shooting for one day during 10 - 12 December in London. This is a paid opportunity (¬£750 per person) with no former acting experience needed to apply. Talent must be willing to share family photos and be comfortable with small crew to film inside their home for final scene.

Please apply ASAP with full names, ages, selfie and short intro about relationship and love of football to: hello@mcauleycasting.com with the subject ‚ÄòFootball Family‚Äô

items.text:
Hi Everyone! I run a nonprofit that provides children who have lost a parent or sibling with a special gift or experience to help them on their grief journey. In June 2026 we are hosting a 5-day free theater day-camp in Boulder for these bereaved children. We are partnering with an Atlanta-based theater company, Destination Theatre. If you or someone you know has a child who would qualify, please feel free to share this information with them. More info is on our website and application. Statistically 1 in 12 children will lose a parent or sibling by the time they are an adult so it is quite possible someone knows someone who would benefit from this experience.  I will be posting this in several groups, so you may see this again!

Take care!

items.text:
Casting call: Digital spot for RV Rental Company 

Looking for talent for an RV Rental shoot on Monday 12/1 OR Tuesday 12/2  in TBD Greater Denver area (within 1 hr)

Looking for a couple (ages ~28-40) with a dog, OR a couple with one young kid (~1-6yo). 

Simple lifestyle scenes around an RV/camping. No lines. 

Rate: $1200 total for the group. 

6 hrs max, likely Noon-6pm. 

If you are interested, please email me (rileyjhanlon@gmail.com) with a group shot (preferred) or individual pics to show everyone, and whether you are available for Monday 12/1, Tuesday 12/2, or both and put ‚ÄúRV Spot - (your name)‚Äù in the subject. 

Thank you!

topComments.text: Jaelyn Bennett I feel like you guys would be perfect for this.  Even if youre on the young side of the age group!
I just submitted!  We would love to do this!

items.text:
Schauspielerin (20, Berlin) ‚Äì offen f√ºr Hauptrollen, Kurzfilme & Studentenprojekte üé¨üíõ

Hey zusammen üòä
ich bin Katie-Fiona Fuhrig, 20, Schauspielerin aus Berlin, und suche Rollen in Kurzfilmen, Studentenfilmen, Webserien und Independent-Projekten.

Zu mir:
‚Ä¢ 10 Jahre Theatererfahrung
‚Ä¢ Kameraerfahrung bei ‚ÄûBerlin ‚Äì Tag & Nacht‚Äú
‚Ä¢ textsicher, nat√ºrlich, zuverl√§ssig
‚Ä¢ flexibel & sofort verf√ºgbar
‚Ä¢ offen f√ºr Hauptrollen und emotionale, charakterstarke Rollen

Material:
‚Ä¢ Portrait- & Ganzk√∂rperfoto (schicke ich per DM)

items.text:
MANCHESTER UK BASED ONLY

Short film

'he lives here' 

A sleepless corporate worker is forced to confront the monstrous embodiment of their childhood trauma during a terrifying sleep paralysis episode.

A vocalist is needed to compliment the soundtrack for a short film.

Feminine-leaning vocals rooted in harmonising dreamy soundscapes, singing and soft spoken word. 

Inspiration: 

Phoebe Bridgers
Agnes Obel
Ethel Cain 

PLEASE NOTE:
This is a Manchester, UK based opportunity only
Unpaid student film, travel & catering provided

From Writer/Director/Producer Jacob James Ward
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIponbMURSU

Send me a DM or message:
@wardmakesfilms - instagram
jacobward044@gmail.com

items.text:
**CASTING CALL **

Hey, wir suchen Schauspieler*innen f√ºr unseren Low-Budget-Studenten-Kurzfilm. Bei Interesse kontaktiert uns bitte per E-Mail: **[LivShortfilm2026@gmail.com](mailto:LivShortfilm2026@gmail.com)**.

Der Film wird an verschiedenen Locations gedreht, daher solltet ihr √ºber einen l√§ngeren Zeitraum (**mindestens eine Woche am St√ºck**) verf√ºgbar sein. 

**Unterk√ºnfte, Anfahrt und Verpflegung werden gestellt.**

** **

** **

**Gesucht wird:**

 

**M√§nnlich gelesene Person (Schauspieler*in)**

20-35 Jahre alt

**Voraussetzungen:**
* Autof√ºhrerschein
* Deutsche Sprache C1

 

**Drehort:**

Prim√§r M√ºnster NRW

 

**Drehtage:**

7 Drehtage zwischen dem 07. und 16. Januar

 

**Handlung:**

Die S√§ngerin Liv k√§mpft mit ihrer stagnierenden Karriere. Nachdem sie vor einem ihrer Auftritte zusammengebrochen ist, nimmt sie sich eine Auszeit mit ihrem Freund.

W√§hrend er glaubt, ihren Traum zu retten, versucht sie, sich von dem zu befreien, was aus diesem Traum geworden ist.

**Wir freuen uns √ºber alle Bewerbungen!**

**CASTING CALL: LIVE SHOW HOSTS**

Los Angeles (Hollywood Studio)

**Firework** is seeking energetic, camera-ready **Live Show Hosts** to lead interactive livestream product demonstrations!

**PAY:** $25-$40/hour (based on experience)

**ROLE DETAILS:**
* Host live product shows from our Hollywood, CA studio
* Present tech & lifestyle products in an authentic, conversational style
* Work as freelance/1099 with potential to transition to part-time employee
* Average 5-10 hours/week (rarely exceeds 15 hours)
* Mostly weekdays, 8 AM - 8 PM PT

**WE'RE LOOKING FOR:**
* Strong on-camera presence & natural speaking ability
* Reliable, punctual, professional
* Available weekdays during business hours
* Prior hosting/livestream/UGC/acting experience preferred but not required

**AUDITION OPTIONS:**

**Option 1: On-Site Audition**
* Dates: December 10-11, 2025
* Time: 10 AM - 1 PM PT
* 10-15 min audition (3-min one-take hosting scenario)

**Option 2: Self-Tape Submission**
* Deadline: December 11, 2025 (11:59 PM PT)
* 3 minutes, vertical, one continuous take
* Host any tech/electronic product as if live
* Email to: Kimmy@fireworkhq.com
* Subject: [Your Name] ‚Äì Live Show Host Submission - LA Digital Showroom Host - Self Tape Submission

**TO APPLY:** [https://jobs.lever.co/fireworkhq/cd7d4561-4c57-4260-b880-8000a95f6f44](https://jobs.lever.co/fireworkhq/cd7d4561-4c57-4260-b880-8000a95f6f44)

**Questions? **Contact: [Kimmy@fireworkhq.com](mailto:Kimmy@fireworkhq.com)

items.text:
Now casting couples in mixed orientation relationships for a new documentary series with a major cable network.

Mixed orientation relationships, often known as lavender partnerships, involve two partners who differ in their sexual orientation. We want to hear from couples who live together, share a daily life, and are engaged, married, or soon to be engaged.

This series will explore how couples navigate identity, commitment, outside expectations, and the realities of loving in a way that challenges societal norms.

If this describes you or someone you know, you can share your story at the link below.

mixedorientationcasting.castingcrane.com

Aixed-orientation relationships-sometimes referred to as lavender partnerships-are relationships in which the two partners differ in their sexual orientation. We are looking for couples who: ‚Ä¢Identify as mixed orientation Live together and share daily life ‚Ä¢Engaged, Married, Or Soon To Be Engaged This series will explore how couples balance love, identity, outside expectations, and the realities of a relationship that goes against societal norms. SHARE YOUR STORY castingebodegapictures.com mixedorintotons.sing.'

items.text:
Casting Call üéâüéâüéâ

‚ÄòThe Lines We Crossed‚Äô short film üé¨

A raw and tender story of found family, the messiness of healing, and the unexpected power of being seen. Three lives, stitched together by loneliness, come alive in the light of connection - and in that light, hope can take root where none was meant to grow.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Secondary role: Mrs Habib, Deva's mother, was once warm and loving, but grief has reshaped her. She struggles to see her son as she once did and can no longer be the nurturing presence he longs for. Her heart turned stone cold, after the death of her only daughter, she now suppresses her maternal instincts.

Female
30-55 years
Middle Eastern heritage

Shooting date: 08/12/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Secondary role: Mrs. Kane is dramatic, flirty, and unapologetically over-the-top, with a flair for gossip and a love of all things a little chavvy. While she loves both of her children, her eldest, Cody, is clearly the favorite - her pride and joy - often leaving Keira to fend for herself. Mrs. Kane desperately clings to Cody's success, seeing it as her ticket to status and financial security.

Female
30-55 years
White/Caucasian
London Accent

Shooting date: 06/12/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Extra: Marty is the friendly local shopkeeper who's known the Kane family for years. He's the kind of man who hears all the town gossip but never lets a word slip. With his quick wit and easy smile, this cheeky chappy brings warmth and quiet support to everyone who crosses his path.

Male
50-70 years
White/Caucasian

Shooting date: 29/11/2025
Location: London
Unpaid, festival exposure & portfolio content 

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

Deadline: 26/11/2025 at 12pm GMT

To audition please contact @lines_we_crossed_film on instagram or Madeleine Bloore here on Facebook.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

items.text:
DRAMA SHORT FILM CASTING CALL ‚Äì In His Care

SYNOPSIS: When granddaughter, Rose, stops receiving letters from her sick grandmother she insists on visiting. Surprised, she finds a man who claims to be her grandmother‚Äôs new carer. As he continues to ask strange questions and refuses to let Rose see her, she realises the man is taking advantage of her poor grandmother, using medicines to make her sicker. When confronted the man becomes enraged and is forced to kill little Rose. 

Wanted: 1 actor (M)for exciting new short film ‚ÄòIn His Care‚Äô. Shooting in HATFIELD, w/c 24th November, student project from an award-winning Film & TV course.

- HARRY (Male, 35 - 50)

- Description: Mid 30s to 50

Harry is carer to Ruth, conniving and manipulative; calculated and dominating. He knows what he wants and how to get it. He isn‚Äôt a smart perpetrator but rather simple-minded praying on those who can‚Äôt defend themselves and has no one to defend them. He has been getting away with it until a young girl with a fiery soul starts to uncover his secret.

Height: Tall (6ft approx.)

- Appearance: Harry is a seemingly ordinary guy on the outside. Charismatic, confident, tall, handsome, well kept. If you walked past him down the street, he may smile or wink at you. He uses his looks and caring fa√ßade as leverage.

- Travel expenses and food covered

If you‚Äôre interested, please submit showreels and any enquiries to dylanturner1501@gmail.com

topComments.text: No such thing as unpaid and urgent
